column4: Hey.  I just installed Ubuntu under a Qemu VM, and I've gotta say, it's !@#$ing AMAZING!
I'm used to Gentoo, where I have to do all the work to integrate things.  Ubuntu is so polished in comparison.
Yeah its nice.  Do you know when he's going to do this.  Because fiesty is going to rock.
Oh, it's definitely at least a few months ago.
